title: Prefigurative Community Building (Part 42): Solidarity Economy Convergences - Building Collective Power Across Sectors
summary: A guide to hosting multi-sectoral gatherings that build relational infrastructure across movements without homogenizing or centralizing them.

Community.summary: Create gatherings that build relationships and coordination across different sectors of the solidarity economy and social movements.

level0: Gather a core convening team representing multiple sectors and communities
Define intentional principles for inclusive, anti-oppressive gathering
Map the landscape of local solidarity economy and movement groups
level1: Extend personal invitations to diverse projects and informal networks
Design convergence format that reflects shared power and horizontal coordination
Create interweaving opportunities for different sectors to find each other
level2: Host convergences that prioritize relationship-building over content delivery
Fund gatherings through reciprocity and mutual aid rather than corporate sponsorship
Archive and share learnings through community-controlled documentation
level3: Support others in hosting their own locally-rooted convergences
Build networks of convergence organizers for mutual support and learning
Create lasting infrastructure for cross-movement relationship and coordination

Knowledge.summary: Develop and share knowledge about movement convergence organizing and cross-sector collaboration.

level0: Learn about successful movement convergences and solidarity economy gatherings
Study facilitation methods for large group horizontal decision-making
level1: Practice facilitating cross-movement dialogue and relationship-building sessions
Document your convening team's process and accessibility practices
Learn about funding convergences through community-controlled resources
level2: Host workshops on convergence organizing and movement weaving
Create resources about Power With approaches to large group facilitation
Share knowledge with other convergence organizers and movement builders
level3: Research and document impacts of horizontal vs hierarchical movement gatherings
Train facilitators in other communities starting convergence processes

Narrative.summary: Challenge movement isolation narratives while promoting stories of cross-sector collaboration and collective power.

level0: Share stories about successful cross-movement collaboration and solidarity
Challenge narratives that promote competition between social movements
Practice seeing movements as interconnected rather than isolated
level1: Document examples of effective solidarity economy convergences and gatherings
Challenge hierarchical conference models and expert-centered event formats
Share stories of horizontal organizing and collective power building
level2: Lead community conversations about movement interconnection and solidarity
Create media highlighting successful cross-sector organizing
Advocate for movement gathering approaches that center community voice
level3: Contribute to cultural shift toward viewing movements as interconnected ecosystem
Develop and share analysis of convergence organizing as movement building practice
Support broader solidarity economy and movement weaving efforts
